comments: Powers of 3 with positive exponent, repeated. - _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 27 2009
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,3).
prog: (MAGMA) [3^Floor((n+1)/2): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 16 2011(PARI) a(n)=3^floor((n+1)/2); \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Apr 23 2013
crossrefs: Essentially the same as A108411 and A162436.
